content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 15 Mar 2019I would like to compare against different survey tools to find out which one suits me the best (e.g. opinionworld, surveyon, rakuteninsight, google opinion)? Could anyone share the experience?Which one has the highest payout per month? What kind of personal data they are collecting?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 15 Mar 2019Highest payout per month would be this app called Milieu. I use it daily.I also use opinion world, rakuten, and google opinion. Rakuten is pretty fast too. Google opinion only gives you google credits, not cash. So if you want to use those credits to buy apps/in-app stuff, then go ahead :)0 comments1

Margarette Nicole SantosLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 19 Mar 2019I have used Rakuten,The Panel Station and Toluna.So far i find Rakuten and Toluna the best in terms of the survey types. Unfortunately for Rakuten, some surveys can also be accessed thru desktop which can be inconvenient at times.I have tried to claim rewards from Toluna. Payout was fast. I received the Dairy Farm voucher in my mail in a week.As per Rakuten, i haven't tried to claim rewards but I think the payout is slower as the grocery vouchers has a specific cut off deadline for claiming which can take up to a month or so.0 comments0
